Patient 34: Fifty-eight-year-old Clara leaves for a three-month medical mission in the Amazon next week. Her usual list—atorvastatin, hydrochlorothiazide, and an albuterol inhaler—remains unchanged, but she received atovaquone / proguanil for malaria plus a standby pack of nirmatrelvir with ritonavir for remote COVID treatment. Grapefruit warnings were reviewed because of her statin.
